inclusion.criterion: Epileptic patient on two tolerated and appropriately chosen and used antiepilptic drugs with no response
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: patient was maintained on Dilantin and phenobarbital

exclusion.criterion: Carnitine deficiency (primary), carnitine palmitoyltransferase (CPT) I OR II deficiency, carnitine translocase deficiency, β-oxidation defects, pyruvate carboxylase deficiency, and porphyria
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hypersensitivity to any component, murine proteins. b. Heart failure c. Active infection
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, and epilepsy presenting with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in at his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.
